preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 40 g of silver (Ag), 240 g of bismuth (Bi), 10 g of zinc (Zn), and 400 g of zirconium (Zr). 
 2. In a clean, dry container, combine the measured amounts of Ag, Bi, Zn, and Zr. 
 3. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture into a fine powder, ensuring uniformity.
